shortdesc.ph: Gets a new token when the current token expires after a period of time.

refbody.section:
This method renews your token. Token 会在一定时间后失效。 The application should call this method to get the new `token`. Failure to do so will result in the SDK disconnecting from the server.
The SDK triggers the callback.
The callback reports (9).

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
-1(ERR_FAILED): A general error occurs (no specified reason).
-2 (ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT): The parameter is invalid.
-7(ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED): The SDK is not initialized.
